hackathons: Secured the second position in HACKMAIT 3.0 among 75+ participating teams, organized by IOSD-MAIT.

experience.description: Working in the Relay Product and Tech team as an SDE intern.
Worked on creating intuitive interfaces for a modern quote-to-cash platform.
Worked on multiple classrooms feature, created an admin dashboard, learner-facing pages, and UI components.
Designed RESTful APIs with Node.js, used Redis for caching, and created responsive pages with React.js and Tailwind CSS.
